org.puremvc.java.multicore.utilities.pipes.plumbing
Class TeeMerge

java.lang.Object
  org.puremvc.java.multicore.utilities.pipes.plumbing.Pipe
      org.puremvc.java.multicore.utilities.pipes.plumbing.TeeMerge
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPipeFitting
public class TeeMerge
extends Pipe

Merging Pipe Tee.

Writes the messages from multiple input pipelines into a single output pipe fitting.

Constructor Detail

TeeMerge

public TeeMerge()
Constructor.

TeeMerge

public TeeMerge(IPipeFitting input1,
                IPipeFitting input2)
Constructor.

Create the TeeMerge and the two optional constructor inputs. This is the most common configuration, though you can connect as many inputs as necessary by calling connectInput repeatedly.

Connect the single output fitting normally by calling the connect method, as you would with any other IPipeFitting.

Method Detail

connectInput

public java.lang.Boolean connectInput(IPipeFitting input)
Connect an input IPipeFitting.

NOTE: You can connect as many inputs as you want by calling this method repeatedly.

Parameters:
input - the IPipeFitting to connect for input.
